content.json: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected called [**InfobloxCDC**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-InfobloxCloudDataConnector-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

# Infoblox CDC BloxOne DDI & Threat Defense Workbook

##### Get a closer look at your BloxOne DNS Query/Response logs, DHCP logs and Threat Defense security event data. 

This workbook is intended to help visualize BloxOne query data as part of the Infoblox Cloud Data Connector. Drilldown your data and visualize events, trends, and anomalous changes over time.

Supported BloxOne Cloud Source log types:
* Threat Defense Query/Response Log
* Threat Defense Threat Feeds Hits Log
* DDI Query/Response Log
* DDI DHCP Lease Log

---

#### Set a time range for which to view data using the dropdown to the left. It will be applied to all visualizations of this workbook. Note that using a large range may cause queries to timeout depending on the size of your environment. Reduce the range if this keeps occurring.

---

## Events by Device
---
#### Get a closer look into where threat data is originating. 
This section visualizes which devices are producing the most hits. Further drilldown data by source IP address. 

Make sure to set all Threat Defense dropdowns below back to "All" when switching between Log Types.

parameters.name: FeedParam
parameters.label: Feed
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| summarize by InfobloxB1FeedName
| order by InfobloxB1FeedName asc

parameters.name: ThreatClassParam
parameters.label: Threat Class
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| summarize by ThreatClass
| order by ThreatClass asc
| project value = ThreatClass, label = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where isnotempty(SourceIP)
| summarize count() by SourceIP
| top 15 by count_ 
| project SourceIP);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where SourceIP in ((Top))
| project TimeGenerated, SourceIP
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SourceIP
content.title: Top Source IPs by Time

content.json:
#### Click on a Device in the chart below to further drilldown the device.

---

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| summarize count() by SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Hit Count by Device

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'RPZ'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_Score, ThreatConfidence, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxB1FeedName, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, DeviceAction, InfobloxB1PolicyName, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network
content.title: Events for {ip}

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'DNS'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DestinationDnsDomain, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network, InfobloxDNSQClass, InfobloxDNSQType, InfobloxDNSRCode, Protocol
content.title: Events for {ip}

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| extend InfobloxB1FeedName = case(InfobloxB1FeedName == "", InfobloxRPZ, InfobloxB1FeedName)
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| summarize count() by InfobloxB1FeedName
| top 10 by count_ 
| project InfobloxB1FeedName);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| extend InfobloxB1FeedName = case(InfobloxB1FeedName == "", InfobloxRPZ, InfobloxB1FeedName)
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in ((Top))
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| project TimeGenerated, InfobloxB1FeedName
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by InfobloxB1FeedName
content.title: Feed Trend for {ip}

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};

// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"

// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"

| extend ThreatClass = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)

| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ThreatClass

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"

InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"

content.json:
#### The time graph below utilizes Time Brushing. Click and drag between two points of the graph to view events for only that window of time. By not selecting any window you can also view all events for the TimeRange selected at the top of this workbook. 

---

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| summarize count() by DestinationDnsDomain
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Queries for {ip}

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
let timeframe = 1h;
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| where isnotempty(DestinationDnsDomain)
| summarize count() by DestinationDnsDomain
| top 15 by count_ 
| project DestinationDnsDomain);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| where DestinationDnsDomain in ((Top))
| project TimeGenerated, DestinationDnsDomain
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by DestinationDnsDomain
content.title: Top Queries for {ip} by Time

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| summarize count()
content.title: Events Count

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceEventClassID, ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_Score, ThreatConfidence, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxB1FeedName, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, DeviceAction, InfobloxB1PolicyName, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network

InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'DNS'
| where '{ip}' == SourceIP 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DestinationDnsDomain, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network, InfobloxDNSQClass, InfobloxDNSQType, InfobloxDNSRCode, Protocol

content.json:
## Events by Destination Domain
---
#### Get a closer look into what is being queried. 
This section visualizes where users are visiting. Further drilldown data by destination query (domain). 

Make sure to set all Threat Defense dropdowns below back to "All" when switching between Log Types.

parameters.name: FeedParam
parameters.label: Feed
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| summarize by InfobloxB1FeedName
| order by InfobloxB1FeedName asc

parameters.name: ThreatClassParam
parameters.label: Threat Class
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| summarize by ThreatClass
| order by ThreatClass asc
| project value = ThreatClass, label = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)

items.name: parameters - 6 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.title: Top Queries by Time

content.json:
#### Click on a Query in the chart below to further drilldown the query.

---

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| summarize count() by DestinationDnsDomain
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Hit Count by Query/Domain

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'RPZ'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_Score, ThreatConfidence, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxB1FeedName, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, DeviceAction, InfobloxB1PolicyName, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network
content.title: Events for {domain}

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'DNS'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DestinationDnsDomain, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network, InfobloxDNSQClass, InfobloxDNSQType, InfobloxDNSRCode, Protocol

#### The time graph below utilizes Time Brushing. Click and drag between two points of the graph to view events for only that window of time. By not selecting any window you can also view all events for the TimeRange selected at the top of this workbook. 

---

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| summarize count() by SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Devices Querying {domain}

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
let timeframe = 1h;
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| where isnotempty(SourceIP)
| summarize count() by SourceIP
| top 15 by count_ 
| project SourceIP);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| where SourceIP in ((Top))
| project TimeGenerated, SourceIP
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SourceIP
content.title: Top Devices Querying {domain} by Time

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs '{LogTypeParam}'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| summarize count()
content.title: Events Count

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'RPZ'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceEventClassID, ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_Score, ThreatConfidence, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxB1FeedName, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, DeviceAction, InfobloxB1PolicyName, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network

InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and TimeGenerated {brush} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs 'DNS'
| where '{domain}' == DestinationDnsDomain 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, DestinationDnsDomain, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network, InfobloxDNSQClass, InfobloxDNSQType, InfobloxDNSRCode, Protocol

content.json:
## BloxOne Threat Defense Security Overview
---
#### Top level insight into your BloxOne Threat Defense security data.

parameters.name: FeedParam
parameters.label: Feed
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| summarize by InfobloxB1FeedName
| order by InfobloxB1FeedName asc

parameters.name: ThreatClassParam
parameters.label: Threat Class
parameters.query:
InfobloxCDC
| summarize by ThreatClass
| order by ThreatClass asc
| project value = ThreatClass, label = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| summarize dcount(SourceIP)
content.title: Unique Impacted Devices

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1ConnectionType == "remote_client"
| summarize dcount(SourceIP)
content.title: Unique Impacted B1 Endpoints

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| summarize dcount(DestinationDnsDomain)
content.title: Unique Threat Indicators

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| summarize dcount(ThreatClass)
content.title: Unique Threat Classes

content.json:
---
## Threat Level

content.query:
datatable (Count:long, ThreatLevel:string, ThreatLevel_count:long) [0,"N/A",1, 0,"Info",2, 0,"Low",3, 0,"Medium",4, 0,"High",5]
|union
(
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend ThreatLevel_count = case(ThreatLevel == "High", 5, ThreatLevel=="Medium", 4, ThreatLevel=="Low", 3, ThreatLevel=="Info", 2, 1)
| summarize Count = count() by ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_count
)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_count
| sort by ThreatLevel_count asc
content.title: Hit Count by Threat Level

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ThreatLevel
content.title: Threat Level Trend

content.json:
---
## Feed

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend InfobloxB1FeedName = case(InfobloxB1FeedName == "", InfobloxRPZ, InfobloxB1FeedName)
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| summarize count() by InfobloxB1FeedName
| order by count_ desc
content.title: Hit Count by Feed

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend InfobloxB1FeedName = case(InfobloxB1FeedName == "", InfobloxRPZ, InfobloxB1FeedName)
| summarize count() by InfobloxB1FeedName
| top 10 by count_ 
| project InfobloxB1FeedName);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend InfobloxB1FeedName = case(InfobloxB1FeedName == "", InfobloxRPZ, InfobloxB1FeedName)
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in ((Top))
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1FeedName)
| project TimeGenerated, InfobloxB1FeedName
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by InfobloxB1FeedName
content.title: Feed Trend

---
## Class

InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"

| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"

content.query:
let starttime = {TimeRange:start};
let endtime = {TimeRange:end};
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend ThreatClass = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)
| summarize count() by ThreatClass
| top 10 by count_ 
| project ThreatClass);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| extend ThreatClass = case(ThreatClass == "", "N/A", ThreatClass)
| where ThreatClass in ((Top))
| project TimeGenerated, ThreatClass
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by ThreatClass
content.title: Class Trend

---
## Events

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| where ThreatClass in ({ThreatClassParam}) or '{ThreatClassParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where InfobloxB1FeedName in~ ({FeedParam}) or InfobloxRPZ in~ ({FeedParam}) or'{FeedParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ({ActionParam}) or InfobloxB1PolicyAction has_cs "{ActionParam:label}" or '{ActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceEventClassID, ThreatLevel, ThreatLevel_Score, ThreatConfidence, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxB1FeedName, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, DeviceAction, InfobloxB1PolicyName, SourceIP, DeviceName, SourceMACAddress, SourceUserName, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1Network

content.json:
## Filters 
---

Category filters are a set of content categorization rules that BloxOne Threat Defense Cloud uses to detect and filter specific internet content. Based on your configuration, specific actions such as Allow or Block will be taken on the detected content.

Application filters are a set of rules that BloxOne Threat Defense Cloud uses to detect and filter specific Internet content. The Application Classification Service (ACS) provides accessibility to applications based on their category or subcategory. Using application filters, you can set security policies based on whether you want to allow an app to access the Internet at all times, or if you want the app to use local resolution when used with BloxOne DDI appliances. 

See more about filters on the official [Infoblox Documentation Portal](https://docs.infoblox.com/display/BloxOneThreatDefense/Filters).

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "CAT_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "CAT_" or InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "APP_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "APP_"
| summarize count()
content.title: All Filter Hits

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "CAT_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "CAT_"
| summarize count()
content.title: Category Filter Hits

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "APP_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "APP_"
| summarize count()
content.title: Application Filter Hits

parameters.name: CatFilterSorter
parameters.label: Sort Tiles By

InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "CAT_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "CAT_"
| summarize count() by DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxDomainCat
| sort by {CatFilterSorter}
| take 50

parameters.name: AppFilterSorter
parameters.label: Sort Tiles By

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs "APP_" or InfobloxRPZ has_cs "APP_"
| summarize count() by DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxDomainCat
| sort by {AppFilterSorter}
| take 50

content.query:
InfobloxCDC
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange} 
| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs '{FilterTypeParam}' or InfobloxRPZ has_cs '{FilterTypeParam}'
| where '{filter}' == InfobloxDomainCat
| sort by  TimeGenerated desc, SourceIP desc

| where DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" 
| where InfobloxB1FeedName has_cs '{FilterTypeParam}' or InfobloxRPZ has_cs '{FilterTypeParam}'
| where '{filter}' == InfobloxDomainCat

| top 10 by count_ desc
